arts.ttl: Chris Davies explains why Krystian Bielik was absent as Birmingham City battered Shrewsbury
arts.sum: Blues face the Gas, Barnsley and Peterborough United in League One before meeting the latter in the Vertu Trophy final at Wembley on April 13. Krystian Bielik missed Birmingham City’s resounding victory over Shrewsbury Town with ‘a little knock’.

The former Cheltenham man got his second of the afternoon three minutes from time when he took the ball around Blackman before slotting home. Town conceded twice from set pieces in a clash that was hardly a contest for the vast majority of the game on another bruising afternoon.

arts.ttl: Chris Davies sets Birmingham City mission after moment that unleashed ‘different animal’
arts.sum: “It’s a game of football, it’s worth three points if you win, that’s what it is ultimately, but it was a day where we didn’t do ourselves justice so we want to try and correct that.” Chris Davies wants his Birmingham City title chasers to ‘correct’ the one performance this season that he’s had to apologise for.

arts.ttl: Chris Davies admits ‘bottom line’ after Alfie May ends 16-game Birmingham City drought
arts.sum: Chris Davies has backed Alfie May to hit the goals trail again after Birmingham City’s number nine ended his 16-game goal drought. Chris Davies admits ‘bottom line’ after Alfie May ends 16-game Birmingham City drought

arts.ttl: Alfie May double sends Birmingham step closer to Championship
Chris Davies gives Paik and Stansfield injury updates after Birmingham City duo return early
arts.sum: Chris Davies doesn’t believe Paik Seung-ho is in danger of missing Birmingham City’s trip to Wembley after returning from international duty with an injury. Chris Davies gives Paik and Stansfield injury updates after Birmingham City duo return early

arts.ttl: Marc Leonard starts in Birmingham City predicted XI for Shrewsbury
arts.sum: Blues have enjoyed a much-needed break during the international window but now begin a gruelling run of 11 matches in 36 days – including the Vertu Trophy final against Peterborough United at Wembley. Chris Davies's runaway League One leaders face Peterborough United on Sunday, April 13 in the final of the Vertu Trophy, looking to clinch the first past of a double after a season of incredible success.

arts.ttl: Chris Davies reveals transfer plan for Rangers star 'loving it' at Birmingham City
arts.sum: Chris Davies has confirmed Birmingham City will look into the prospect of signing loan ace Kieran Dowell on a permanent basis. Birmingham City signed Kieran Dowell on loan from Rangers towards the end of the January transfer window

arts.ttl: Michael Appleton sees short Shrewsbury Town stint as an opportunity
arts.sum: It has been a tough week for the Town supporters, but ahead of the League One clash at St Andrew’s against Birmingham, he urged them to look forward - not back. “I want to be in the dugout or a dugout come the start of next season.

arts.ttl: Peterborough United release Birmingham City statement and promise action will be taken
arts.sum: Peterborough United have released a statement ahead of next month's Vertu Trophy final against Birmingham City at Wembley and have promised that stadium bans await anybody who sells tickets in their end to their Blues equivalents. "The Club are aware that Birmingham City supporters are targeting Posh supporters via social media offering financial incentive to purchase tickets for the Vertu Trophy Final on their behalf in our end of Wembley Stadium," Peterborough's statement read.
